sentences.cn: “您可以重复一遍吗？”她咯咯地笑着说。

sentences.en: Beg pardon, I didn't quite catch your meaning.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我没听懂你的意思.

sentences.en: Braving the biting wind, she went out to beg from door to door.
sentences.cn: 她不顾寒风刺骨, 出去挨门乞讨.

sentences.en: Cross decided to beg and wheedle a bit.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯决定用上点乞求和哄骗。

sentences.en: Derelicts often beg on the streets.
sentences.cn: 无家可归的人常常在街上行乞.

sentences.en: I beg of you not to run any risk.
I beg your pardon ( but would you repeat what you said )?
sentences.cn: 对不起,请你再讲一遍好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I beg your pardon, pray continue.
I beg your pardon, what you say is not exactly correct.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 你说的话并不完全对.

sentences.en: I was impolite and I do beg your pardon.
In those years they were forced to beg for a living.
sentences.cn: 那些年他们被迫乞讨维生.

sentences.en: May I beg you for a subscription?
She begged and pleaded with them until they finally agreed.
sentences.cn: 她一再恳求，后来他们终于同意了。

sentences.en: She fought back the sudden urge to run to him and beg his forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 她突然很想冲上去请求他原谅，但是她忍住了。

sentences.en: This is what I beg of you.
We humbly beg Your Majesty to show mercy.
sentences.cn: 我们恳请陛下发发慈悲.

sentences.en: We were invited to stay for dinner, but we had to beg off.
sentences.cn: 我们被邀请留下来吃晚饭，但我们不得不谢绝了

sentences.en: You beg him to try just one spoonful, and he clamps his mouth shut.
sentences.cn: 你求他就尝一匙，可他就是不张嘴。

words.tran_cn: 乞讨，乞求；行乞（beg的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 借故推辞，谢绝：要求从某件事，如一项义务解脱出来
未经讨论就认为某一有待证明的论点或主张正确；把尚无定论（或有待证明）的事当作事实来看待；想当然，主观臆断，武断
（物品因别人不需要）随时可用

trans.tran_cn: 恳求，乞讨，（狗）用后腿站立，请求原谅
trans.tran_en: to ask for something in an anxious or urgent way, because you want it very much
